About Me

Graduate Student at NYU Courant. Technology Enthusiast. Currently Learning about Big Data Systems, Distributed Systems, Security and Applied Crypotgraphy. Prior to joining graduate program at NYU, I worked at Samsung Research India, Bangalore for 3 years with Communication Research Team. I completed my B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Bombay in 2014. you can download my CV here.

  • Big Data Science by Prof. Anasse Bari

  • Introduction to Cryptography by Prof. Oded Regev
  • Operating Systems by Prof. Hubertus Frankeh
  • Programming Languages by Prof. Benjamin Goldberg
